meanings.definition: A title of respect for a man in Italy.
meanings.sent1: The signiori greeted the guests with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The signiori was known for his generosity in the village.
meanings.sent3: The signiori accidentally spilled his coffee while trying to juggle too many things.
meanings.sent4: The signiori of the house was like a guardian angel, always looking out for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The signiori's presence in the room commanded attention and respect.

meanings.definition: Used as a form of address for a man in Italy.
meanings.sent1: Signiori, may I have a moment of your time?
meanings.sent2: Signiori, please pass the bread at the table.
meanings.sent3: Signiori, you startled me with your sudden entrance!
meanings.sent4: Signiori, your words are like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: Signiori, your wisdom shines brighter than the sun.
